venue.address_2: Concord Rd. exit off Rte. 3 north
venue.name: COURTYARD by MARRIOTT

item.description:
Paul, who puts on this dance, has his own meetup group, SuperSingles(TM), where this is also listed. 8:00 pm - 12:00 am ( $12. before 9pm, $15. after 9pm) If I can have 10 of us from my meetup group event listings sign up for this ahead of time I can send Paul a list of names to get you a $10 admission. I am listing this with other groups. Free Dance Lesson @ 7:30pm, Top DJ Dance Music, Complimentary Hor D'ouevres, Raffle, Door Prizes and Cash Bar .

Costumes optional.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Look for My Meetup Sign and ask for Neil.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: SuperSingles Halloween Dance
